item.description:
TC: Sharon Rozines 508-879-9433; srozines@yahoo.com

EVENT: Depending on the weather, we will cross-country ski or hike/snowshoe in Callahan State Park in Framingham. Note that ski rental is not available at the park, but is available nearby at REI (on Rte. 30 near Speen St.; opens at 11am).

MEET: Noon in the parking lot on Millwood Street on the south side of the park.
RSVP: Requested, in case the meeting place changes to the parking lot on Edmands Rd. Contact TC to facilitate carpooling. Please be sure to RSVP if you need to be picked up from the Framingham Commuter Rail station. There is a train that leaves South Station at 10:50AM and arrives in Framingham at 11:35AM.
COST: No fee for admission or parking; $5 non-member fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the trip's host for plans for meeting up in the Parking Lot
item.why: This is a great chance to get outside for a fun time in the middle of the winter

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: CROSS COUNTRY SKIING OR HIKING IN CALLAHAN STATE PARK
